metadata.synopsis: Toobin is desperately stalling for time as the Baineites are getting ready to kill the Gondians.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Load up CTY_Main_Aopen debug book and set all IRN prisoners to savedgo to -267; 6; -148watch the ADs play out in front of you.

0.speaker: Black Gauntlet Ifran
0.text: We have your designs. We have your methods. We have no more use for you.

7.speaker: Gondian Zanner Toobin
7.text: We are the greatest engineers in the realm - you need us to maintain the Steel Watch!
7.context: NodeContext: trying to remain cool as he bargains for his life and the lives of his gondians

1.speaker: Black Gauntlet Ifran
1.text: Beg and scream all you wish. You will die today.

6.speaker: Gondian Zanner Toobin
6.text: I have an idea - for a new Watcher. One that could flatten the city with a single swing!
6.context: NodeContext: trying to remain cool as he bargains for his life and the lives of his gondians

2.speaker: Black Gauntlet Ifran
2.text: You are in no position to negotiate, Gondian.

4.speaker: Gondian Zanner Toobin
4.text: But look at all these unfinished Watchers. You need us!
4.context: NodeContext: trying to remain cool as he bargains for his life and the lives of his gondians

3.speaker: Black Gauntlet Ifran
3.text: Convenient that you mention this only when you are about to die.

5.speaker: Gondian Zanner Toobin
5.text: Spare us, and I will begin prototyping the new Watcher. Immediately!
5.context: NodeContext: trying to remain cool as he bargains for his life and the lives of his gondians
